input.sentences: my company had a road race
everyone got together to raise money
output.sentences: The man was getting ready to run in the big company race.
He was hoping to run a lot of laps because it would mean he raised a lot of money for charity.
His friends from the office were also running with him today.
The people stood around nervously waiting for the race to start.
As everyone completed a lap they were given a high five.
